description: Request examples for API Hub endpoints

GET.description: Fetch models from both COMET and FAL APIs

examples.name: Fetch Comet LLMs
examples.description: Get all available Comet language models
notes: Returns 568 LLM models (GPT-4, Claude, Gemini, DeepSeek, Qwen, etc.)
Response format: CometModelsResponse with models array

examples.name: Fetch FAL Creative Models
examples.description: Get all available FAL creative generation models with pagination
notes: Returns 866 creative models across 9 pages (image-to-image, text-to-video, etc.)
Response format: FalModelsResponse with models array and next_cursor
Categories: 281 image-to-image, 127 image-to-video, 116 text-to-image, 92 text-to-video, 88 video-to-video, 33 text-to-audio, 30 vision, 20 image-to-3d, 19 text-to-speech, 17 training, 6 llm

GET.description: Get pricing information for all models

examples.name: Fetch Model Pricing
examples.description: Get comprehensive pricing data across both APIs
notes: Returns unified pricing for 1,434 total models
Comet: Token-based pricing (input/output tokens)
FAL: Request-based pricing with usage tiers

POST.description: Estimate cost for model usage (FAL API only)

examples.name: Estimate Image Generation Cost
examples.description: Calculate cost for flux-pro image generation
notes: Returns estimated cost in USD
Includes breakdown by parameter (image size, inference steps, etc.)

examples.name: Estimate Video Generation Cost
notes: Video models have higher costs due to compute requirements
Duration and resolution significantly impact pricing

examples.name: Estimate LLM Cost
notes: Comet pricing based on token count
Different models have different per-token rates

GET.description: Get usage statistics for FAL models

examples.name: Fetch Usage Records
examples.description: Get historical usage data with filtering
notes: Returns paginated usage records
Includes request count, total cost, timestamps
Can filter by date range, model, or user

GET.description: Get aggregated analytics for model usage

examples.name: Fetch Analytics Dashboard Data
notes: Returns aggregated metrics by model, date, or category
Useful for cost optimization and usage patterns
Includes percentile latency data
